en.name: Overall Performance
en.overall_district_container: How well is this district performing overall?
en.overall_campus_container: How well is this campus performing overall?
en.overall_district_second_title: A New Way of Looking at Academic Performance
en.overall_campus_second_title: A New Way of Looking at Academic Performance
en.overview_district_des: Parents, advocates and community members are important partners in a district's success. This report is designed to give everyone, not just district leaders, a better idea of how a district is performing. Just as a student's report card shows how he or she is doing in different classes, this report card tells us how a district is doing in different areas. It is designed to show the district's strengths in addition to challenges that need to be addressed in order to make sure the needs of all students are being met. While this report may not tell the whole story of a certain district, we can use the report to identify ways to help a district improve over time and reach its full potential.
en.overview_campus_des: Parents, advocates and community members are important partners in a school's success. This report is designed to give everyone, not just campus leaders, a better idea of how a school is performing. Just as a student's report card shows how he or she is doing in different classes, this report card tells us how a school is doing in different areas. It is designed to show the campus' strengths in addition to challenges that need to be addressed in order to make sure the needs of all students are being met. While this report may not tell the whole story of a certain campus, we can use the report to identify ways to help a school improve over time and reach its full potential.

en.name: Distinctions
en.domain_display_title: Where is this campus doing exceptionally well?

en.name: Student Achievement
en.domain_display_title: How well did students do academically this year?
en.overview_page_description: The Student Achievement domain tells us how much students know and are able to do at the end of the school year.
en.description: The Student Achievement domain tells us how well students are doing at the end of the school year. In the earlier grades, this is measured in STAAR tested subjects. In later grades, it considers things outside of STAAR like graduation rate or how well students are prepared for success after high school.
en.weighting_title: How is the grade for Student Achievement calculated?
en.weighting_text_unscored: At the high school level, the Student Achievement score also considers College/career/military readiness & graduation rate.

en.name: Performance on the STAAR Test
en.subdomain_display_title: How well are students performing on the STAAR test?
en.weighting_scored_description_district: For elementary and middle schools, the Student Achievement score is based on STAAR performance only..
en.weighting_scored_description_campus: For elementary and middle schools, the Student Achievement score is based on STAAR performance only..

en.name: Graduation Rate
en.subdomain_display_title: How many students at this campus graduate on time?

en.name: School Progress
en.domain_display_title: School Progress Domain and Score Title
en.overview_page_description: The School Progress domain shows us how students on a campus are performing over time and compares that progress to similar schools.
en.pdf_display_text: The higher of Growth or Performance is used.

en.name: Student Growth
en.weighting_scored_description_district: For this district, the School Progress domain score is based on Student Growth because this district performed better on Student Growth than Relative Performance.
en.weighting_scored_description_campus: For this school, the School Progress domain score is based on Student Growth because this school performed better on Student Growth than Relative Performance.

en.name: Relative Performance
en.weighting_scored_description_district: For this district, the School Progress domain score is based on Relative Performance because this district performed better on Relative Performance than Student Growth.
en.weighting_scored_description_campus: For this school, the School Progress domain score is based on Relative Performance because this school performed better on Relative Performance than Student Growth.

en.name: Closing the Gaps
en.domain_display_title: Closing the Gaps Domain and Score Title
en.overview_page_description: The Closing the Gaps domain tells us how well different populations of students on a campus are performing.
en.pdf_description: Closing the Gaps PDF description copy

en.pdf_display_title: How much district receive per student in 2016-2017
